Sequence Information.Peptide Name: OdTo1 (predicted AMPs, Gly-rich; Leu-rich; Nigrocin,  XXU, 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Anhui Sucker Frog,Odorrana tormota, frog, amphibians, animals, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (85.71%) tofrog OdMa5G=L: 29%; L: 20%; I=C=K: 10%;   GRAVY: 1.4; M Wt: 1957.473; Mol formula: C87H157N23O23S2; Mol ex coeff: 125.Activity:Active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 8 ug/ml), S. enteritidis (MIC 32-64 ug/ml), and S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 8-16 ug/ml).Toxicity: porcine RBC: HC50 >128 ug/ml.
Literature Information.Author: Richter A, Sutherland D, Ebrahimikondori H, Babcock A, Louie N, Li C, Coombe L, Lin D, Warren RL, Yanai A, Kotkoff M, Helbing CC, Hof F, Hoang LMN, Birol I. 2022
Literature Information.Title: Associating biological activity and predicted structure of antimicrobial peptides from amphibians and insects
